contexts.context: ...said Harithoel. "I can't see the coastline at all. But <mark>that's</mark> not all. I haven't found anything edible anywhere. Just weeds...
..."So we'll either be rich or dead," said S'Riizh. <mark>"That's</mark> a comfort."
...includes fixing things with the guards at a discount rate. <mark>That's</mark> where the 'honor among thieves' part comes in. Friends stick together...
...butchers running through the streets. Even in Tel Aruhn, <mark>that's</mark> likely to warrant suspicion.
